abstract: The Samsung Glyde cellphone features a slide-out keyboard for people who like the feel of physical buttons when pecking out e-mail and text messages.
snippet: The Samsung Glyde cellphone features a slide-out keyboard for people who like the feel of physical buttons when pecking out e-mail and text messages.
lead_paragraph: The invasion of the multimedia touch-screen phones continued last week as the Samsung Glyde landed in Verizon Wireless stores. Although the Glyde’s icon-filled 2.8-inch screen looks familiar, the phone features a slide-out keyboard for people who like the feel of physical buttons when pecking out e-mail and text messages.

headline.main: It’s a Touch-Screen Phone, but You Can Still Hunt and Peck
headline.print_headline: It’s a Touch-Screen Phone, but You Can Still Hunt and Peck
